The girl meets a wise old owl who helps her find the end of the rainbow.
The girl comes across a leprechaun who grants her three wishes in exchange for her kindness.
The girl is transported to a mystical world at the end of the rainbow where she meets the queen of the fairies.
The girl discovers a hidden treasure at the end of the rainbow, guarded by a dragon.
The girl is joined on her journey by a talking unicorn who helps her find the end of the rainbow.
